com.solacesystems.jms

Interface SolProducerEventListener


  • public interface SolProducerEventListener
    A callback Listener for JMS Producer events. An application interested in SolProducerEvent(s) such as SolRepublishUnackedMessageEvent should implement the SolProducerEventListener interface and register with a SolProducerEventSource to receive asynchronous notifications when such events occur.

    Note: Event notifications can occur on the session's I/O and event thread, so an application may not call producer operations from this callback handler, as this could cause a deadlock.

    Also see SolProducerEventSource.

    Since:
    7.1.2
